description:
Finishing up their night job, Otae and Oryo walk home under the morning sunlight. While casually badmouthing their customers the two witness Hanako, the new kid at their bar, attempting to throw herself off a bridge. Otae quickly stops her and brings her home, where she learns the deeply troubled Hanako left her hometown of Osaka in order to become a dancer. Hanako then explains how she spent all her savings after joining the Dream Faith – a weird religious cult that promises to grant the power to make dreams come true. The Odd Jobs go undercover with Hanako’s help, but…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Leute mit Dreck am Stecken reden mehr als andere!
People with Dark Pasts Can`t Shut Up
Sune ni Kizu ga Aru Yatsu Hodo Yoku Shaberu
すねに傷がある奴ほどよくしゃべる
